results.deck: Play as a cyborg soldier in this side-scrolling action title from Supressive Fire Games.
results.name: Blood Alloy: Reborn

results.deck: The sequel to 2009's Afro Samurai was considered so unfinished and poorly done that it was pulled from digital distributors less than two months after its release, and all purchases were refunded.
results.name: Afro Samurai 2: Revenge of Kuma

results.deck: React Games presents Super Dungeon Bros, a frantic 1-4 players co-op endless roguelike action RPG.
results.name: Super Dungeon Bros

results.deck: The popular collectible card game goes free-to-play.
results.name: Magic Duels: Origins

results.deck: A game about a blind 10 year-old girl who is looking for her pet cat. Developed by Tiger & Squid and published by Team 17.
results.name: Beyond Eyes

results.deck: A shoot-’em-up developed by Serenity Forge.
results.name: Pixel Galaxy

results.deck: A local-multiplayer physics brawler developed by Frogshark.
results.name: SWORDY

results.deck: A stand-alone prequel to Wolfenstein: The New Order developed by MachineGames for the PC, Xbox One and PlayStation 4.
results.name: Wolfenstein: The Old Blood

results.deck: An instalment of the band-focused rhythm game for the Xbox One and PlayStation 4. Focusing on the core vocals, drums, guitar, and bass instruments, Rock Band 4 offers a new set of on-disc songs while supporting players' existing DLC libraries.
results.name: Rock Band 4

results.deck: A remastered release of Dark Souls II, featuring a graphical upgrade, increased online player limit, remixed locations for items and enemies, and includes all of the previously released DLC.
results.name: Dark Souls II: Scholar of the First Sin

results.deck: A 2D action platformer from GameFreak.
results.name: Tembo the Badass Elephant

results.deck: Titanfall 2 is planned for release on PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and PC.
results.name: Titanfall 2

results.deck: Yooka-Laylee is a spiritual successor to classic 3D platformers, such as Banjo Kazooie, from former RARE developers at Playtonic Games. Playtonic crowdsourced the game's funding through Kickstarter, achieving their goal within 40 minutes.
results.name: Yooka-Laylee

results.deck: An upgraded version of Guacamelee!: Gold Edition, complete with all of the DLC, and new levels and abilities exclusive to this version. Known as the definitive version of Guacamelee
results.name: Guacamelee!: Super Turbo Championship Edition

results.deck: An upgraded version of the 2013 XBLA title featuring all the DLC, brand new animations for both humans and zombies, improved interface and increased graphics quality.
results.name: State of Decay: Year-One Survival Edition

results.deck: The sequel to Giana Sisters: Twisted Dreams introduces four-player multiplayer and an emphasis on speed and competition.
results.name: Giana Sisters: Dream Runners

results.deck: The 2015 edition of the official Grand Prix motorcycle racing game.
results.name: MotoGP 15

results.deck: This is the 2015 edition of the F1 racing game by Codemasters for current generation consoles and PC.
results.name: F1 2015

results.deck: A stealth puzzle action/adventure game coming soon to Windows 10 & Xbox One.
results.name: Transparent Machines

results.deck: A 2.5D downloadable title for the Xbox One, PlayStation 4 and PC.
results.name: Assassin’s Creed Chronicles: India

results.deck: A 2.5D downloadable title for the Xbox One, PlayStation 4 and PC.
results.name: Assassin’s Creed Chronicles: Russia

results.deck: A 2.5D downloadable title for the Xbox One, PlayStation 4 and PC. The game follows Shao Jun, the last remaining Assassin of the Chinese Brotherhood.
results.name: Assassin's Creed Chronicles: China

results.deck: A kickstarted, gothic, pixel art action/platformer for PC and Consoles in the vein of classics like Ghouls 'n Ghosts.
results.name: Slain!

results.deck: Guns, Gore & Cannoli is an homage to the exploitation/grindhouse films from the 70s, the gangster classics, and old school 2D arcade shooters.
results.name: Guns, Gore & Cannoli

results.deck: Pool Nation FX combines simulator elements with a love of tricks.
results.name: Pool Nation FX

results.deck: Ginger Beyond the Crystal combines elements of resource gathering simulation games and action platforming.
results.name: Ginger Beyond the Crystal

results.deck: Heart & Slash is a beat 'em up with roguelike elements.
results.name: Heart & Slash

results.deck: Castles is a match three puzzle game that requires players to use engineers to move blocks on a 5 x 5 grid in order to gather supplies required to continue building the tower.
results.name: Castles

results.deck: Following up two years after Deus Ex: Human Revolution, Mankind Divided sees Adam Jensen working to thwart a terrorist organization bent on promoting human augmentation. It serves as a prequel to Deus Ex, the first entry in the series.
results.name: Deus Ex: Mankind Divided

results.deck: The Lego brand's first foray into the burgeoning "toys-to-life" genre, Dimensions will include characters from properties like The Lord of the Rings, DC Comics, and The Wizard of Oz.
results.name: LEGO Dimensions

results.deck: A sci-fi RPG set during the 'War of Water' on Mars.
results.name: The Technomancer

results.deck: Protect and serve in this open world Unreal Engine 4 police simulator.
results.name: Police 1013

results.deck: An FMV-focused take on Guitar Hero.
results.name: Guitar Hero Live

results.deck: A first-person shooter with an art style reminiscent of old Saturday morning cartoons.
results.name: World War Toons

results.deck: An adventure game based on the Adventure Time license where Finn and Jake dig into their parent's past as detectives, and decide to do some detecting themselves.
results.name: Adventure Time: Finn and Jake Investigations

results.deck: A roguelike survival horror FPS. It features procedural level generation on a component level, AI Director, randomized storyline, and Lovecraftian themes.
results.name: Phantasmal

results.deck: A digital-only sequel in Codemasters' minion-commanding action RPG series.
results.name: Overlord: Fellowship of Evil

results.deck: A new rally focused entry in Codemasters' DiRT franchise.
results.name: DiRT Rally

results.deck: A fighting game based on the Kung Fu Panda series.
results.name: Kung Fu Panda: Showdown of Legendary Legends the Video Game

results.deck: Need for Speed attempts to reboot the franchise with a focus on nighttime street races, multiplayer action, police chases, and new ways for players to configure and tune their cars.
results.name: Need for Speed

results.deck: EA's basketball franchise will make another go of it in 2015.
results.name: NBA Live 16

results.deck: Various football players are already duking it out for the rights to be named the cover athlete for this year's Madden release.
results.name: Madden NFL 16

results.deck: EA's long-running soccer franchise returns for yet another year.
results.name: FIFA 16

results.deck: EA's respected hockey franchise returns yet again with NHL 16.
results.name: NHL 16

results.deck: A Musou/Warriors game based on the novel/manga Arslan Senki
results.name: Arslan: The Warriors of Legend

results.deck: Slice zombies using the Xbox One Kinect!
results.name: Slice Zombies for Kinect

results.deck: Koji Igarashi is working on a spiritual successor to his specific style of Castlevania game with Inti Creates.
results.name: Bloodstained: Ritual of the Night

results.deck: A multiplayer first-person survival game set in a world populated by dinosaurs.
results.name: ARK: Survival Evolved

results.deck: A bullfighting simulator game developed by Recotechnology S.L.
results.name: Toro

results.deck: A space pixel SHMUP developed by Pixelnest Studio. The game hits Steam Early Access on May 18, 2015.
results.name: Steredenn

results.deck: Konami's long-running soccer franchise returns for a 2015 release, taking more advantage of the Fox Engine, among many other improvements.
results.name: Pro Evolution Soccer 2016

results.deck: The marble matching puzzle franchise returns.
results.name: Sparkle Unleashed

results.deck: The aliens have won and the remnants of XCOM must strike to take back the Earth in this sequel to Firaxis' 2012 reboot.
results.name: XCOM 2

results.deck: Bigben continues its series of handball games, this time with new developer Eko Software.
results.name: Handball 16

results.deck: A first-person puzzler that takes place in a futuristic prison.
results.name: Magnetic: Cage Closed

results.deck: The Fallout series continues in a post-apocalyptic Boston, Massachusetts.
results.name: Fallout 4

results.deck: The next game in the Skylanders franchises adds air, sea, and land vehicles to the mix.
results.name: Skylanders SuperChargers

results.deck: A game in the Yu-Gi-Oh! franchise for the Xbox One and PlayStation 4 that spans five series.
results.name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Legacy of the Duelist

results.deck: The seventeenth installment in 2K's basketball franchise features a career mode written and directed by Spike Lee.
results.name: NBA 2K16

results.deck: A collection of the first six Mega Man games that comes with a new challenge mode and archival art assets. The first project of the newly reformed game restoration house, Digital Eclipse.
results.name: Mega Man Legacy Collection

results.deck: The 2015 edition of the offical Tour de France video game franchise.
results.name: Le Tour de France 2015

results.deck: This game melds elements from all previous Souls games and concludes the Dark Souls trilogy.
results.name: Dark Souls III

results.deck: Shadow Warrior 2 promises more Wang.
results.name: Shadow Warrior 2

results.deck: Race for as long as you can in this motorcycle parkour game from Doomlaser.
results.name: Gibson Hyperdrive

results.deck: Based on the classic 80s version of the Transformers animated series, Transformers: Devastation by PlatinumGames is a brawler with an authentic retro-themed art style.
results.name: Transformers: Devastation

results.deck: Players continue the story of Corvo Attano or play as Princess Emily.
results.name: Dishonored 2

results.deck: An action-adventure third person game from Keiji Inafune and some of the creators of Metroid Prime.
results.name: ReCore

results.deck: In celebration of their 30th anniversary, Rare brings a collection of 30 games from their back catalog to the Xbox One, from Battletoads to Viva Piñata.
results.name: Rare Replay

results.deck: An action RPG set in a world devoid of sunlight due to worldwide volcanic eruptions.
results.name: Ashen

results.deck: A puzzle-platformer featuring a yarn cat, developed by Coldwood Interactive and published by Electronic Arts.
results.name: Unravel

results.deck: A first-person open-world multiplayer pirate game developed by Rare for the Xbox One and PC.
results.name: Sea of Thieves

results.deck: A third-person melee-focused game featuring knights, samurai, and vikings going to war with each other.
results.name: For Honor

results.deck: South Park takes on superheroes in this follow up to The Stick of Truth.
results.name: South Park: The Fractured But Whole

results.deck: An entry in the Just Dance series which introduces smartphone interaction and Just Dance Unlimited, a streaming service.
results.name: Just Dance 2016

results.deck: Trackmania Turbo is another attempt to successfully consolize the long-running Trackmania franchise, complete with a visual redesign, a new environment, and official servers for multiplayer.
results.name: Trackmania Turbo

results.deck: Take on South American drug cartels in the latest entry in the Ghost Recon franchise.
results.name: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon: Wildlands

results.deck: a game inspired by "Rubik’s Cubes, Sudoku, Dodecahedrons and way, way too much caffeine,"
results.name: Prismatica

results.deck: Sequel to the Hit game Happy Wars. A game that shift's away from competitive action to a more cooperative play hack-and-slash dungeon-crawler.
results.name: Happy Dungeons

results.deck: an action-adventure game inspired by childhood fears, nightmares and dreams. Now it's time to face your own fears.
results.name: HUSH: Into The Darkness

results.deck: Family comes first. Protect your family after the nuclear aftermath in an underground shelter in this strategy survival game.
results.name: Sheltered

results.deck: A singleplayer survival and exploration experience developed by Hourences and Grip Games, and published by Teotl Studios.
results.name: The Solus Project

results.deck: A lost ex- nasa space marine must meet his family by bypassing the corrupt dictatorship, no freedom of movement. a puzzle adventure game exclusive to Windows 10 and Xbox ONE
results.name: Citizen

results.deck: Time to get munch'n!
results.name: Munch Time 2

results.deck: Building on the first game, Plants vs. Zombies: Garden Warfare 2 features a single-player campaign and plants going on the offensive.
results.name: Plants vs. Zombies: Garden Warfare 2

results.deck: A dual stick shooter for Xbox One.
results.name: Tachyon Project

results.deck: A comedic action RPG for Xbox One.
results.name: Zenith

results.deck: Futuristic racing.
results.name: Quantum Rush Champions

results.deck: Four-player futuristic soccer.
results.name: Soccertron

results.deck: A hybrid of first-person and third-person shooting from Vector Games.
results.name: Dark Raid: Bot Wars

results.deck: A chaotic asymmetrical multiplayer game from Torque Studios.
results.name: Glitchrunners

results.deck: A top-down, cyperpunk shooter from 10tons.
results.name: Neon Chrome

results.deck: Spaera is a puzzle combat game largely inspired by Tetris Battle Gaiden, but with a heavier focus on balance and strategy.
results.name: Spaera

results.deck: An isometric game in which players, as Pac-man, escape the kill screen from the original arcade game.
results.name: Pac-Man 256

results.deck: Announced on E3 2015 on the Microsoft stage Dean "Rocket" Hall called it a “simulation MMO that explores mankind’s expansion into space”
results.name: ION

results.deck: The sequel to the racing simulator Project CARS
results.name: Project CARS 2

results.deck: Gunnheim is 1-4 player local & online co-op twin stick shooter for PC, Xbox One & PS4.
results.name: Gunnheim

results.deck: A 3-episode mini-series from Telltale Games focusing on Michonne.
results.name: The Walking Dead: Michonne

results.deck: An improvisational party game for up to 8 players.
results.name: Quiplash

results.deck: Play as a Squid Hero in this single-player/local co-op Kinect game developed by Virtual Air Guitar Company.
results.name: Squid Hero for Kinect

results.deck: A physics based puzzle game that can be controlled with Kinect or a controller, developed by liica,inc. and OrangeBox Co.
